title: Donald and the wheel
creator_credit: Hamilton Luske and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Donald Duck accidently invents the wheel. Later Egyptians, Greek, Romans and others improve on it. Through songs and commentary the possible history of the wheel is traced. Donald, however, is not very impressed, particularly the aspect of the chaos of modern traffic.
